author: Staff Reporter
text:
A Marathon for Ethical Elections will be organised by the Rotaract Club and Rotary Club of Hosur jointly with the district administration here on Sunday (March 27).

Bearing the banner “My Vote Is Not For Sale”, the run is being organised from Municipal Park here at 6 a.m. The marathon is yet another civil society initiative for change. The marathon will conclude at Andhivadi stadium. Public are invited to actively take part in the marathon.
title: Marathon today
